menu-theme-save-button.tooltip: Press this button to save the layout configuration.

menu-icon.tooltip: Select an icon to show in the panel.

menu-label.tooltip: Enter custom text to show in the panel.

overlay-key.description: Keyboard shortcut to open and close the menu

effect.tooltip: Select the effect on the menu opening and closing.

effect-time.tooltip: The time on seconds to perform the effect(More time is slower).

swap-panels.description: Swap the top and bottom panel
swap-panels.tooltip: Choose whether or not to swap the top and bottom panel on the menu.

allow-search.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show search entry on the menu.

enable-autoscroll.tooltip: Choose whether or not to enable smooth autoscrolling on the menu.

show-box-pointer.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show the menu box pointer.

fix-menu-corner.tooltip: Choose whether or not the menu bordering the screen edge.

menu-editor-button.tooltip: Press this button to customize your menu entries.

allow-resizing.tooltip: Choose whether or not to allow resizing the menu.

automatic-size.tooltip: Choose whether or not to automatic adjust of the menu size.

full-screen.tooltip: Choose whether or not to put the menu in full screen mode.

activate-on-hover.description: Open the menu when I move my mouse over it
activate-on-hover.tooltip: Enable opening the menu when the mouse enters the applet

activate-on-press.description: Open the menu when I press my mouse over it
activate-on-press.tooltip: Enable opening the menu when the mouse press over the applet.

categories-hover.description: Open the category when I move my mouse over it
categories-hover.tooltip: Choose whether or not to open the category when the mouse move over it, otherwise need the mouse click.

categories-icons.tooltip: Choose whether or not to have icons on the categories.

show-recent.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show a recent file list in the menu.

show-places.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show bookmarks and places in the menu.

scroll-categories.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show the scrolling area of categories.

arrow-categories.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show the arrow on the categories.

arrow-categories-selected.description: Only show arrow when selected category
arrow-categories-selected.tooltip: Choose whether or not to only show the arrow when selected the category.

app-button-width.description: Maximum width of the application entry text:
app-button-width.tooltip: Set the maximum width of the application entry text.

app-description.tooltip: Choose whether or not to have description on application entries.

scroll-applications.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show the scrolling area of applications.

show-favorites.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show favorites on the menu.

icon-max-fav-size.tooltip: Set the maximum size of the favorites icon.

favorites-lines.tooltip: Choose the number of favorites lines.

scroll-favorites.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show the scrolling area of favorites.

show-hover-icon.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show hover icon on the menu.

hover-box.tooltip: Choose whether or not to have a box on the hover icon.

show-power-buttons.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show system buttons on the menu.

power-theme.tooltip: Select a layout of system buttons.

power-box.tooltip: Choose whether or not to have a box on the system buttons.

power-symbolic.description: Show symbolic icons on the system buttons
power-symbolic.tooltip: Enable this option to show symbolic icons, on the system buttons and disable to show full color.

show-view-item.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show control buttons.

control-box.tooltip: Choose whether or not to have a box on the control buttons.

view-item.description: Show application entries in grid view
view-item.tooltip: Enable show application entries in grid(icon) view and disable show application entries in list view.

control-symbolic.description: Show symbolic icons on the control buttons
control-symbolic.tooltip: Enable this option to show symbolic icons, on the control buttons and disable to show full color.

spacer-line.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show a line on separator.

show-app-title.description: Show name of the selected application
show-app-title.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show the selected application name on the menu.

app-title-size.description: Font size of the selected application name:
app-title-size.tooltip: Set the font size of the selected application name.

show-app-description.description: Show description of the selected application
show-app-description.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show the selected application description on the menu.

app-description-size.description: Font size of the selected application description:
app-description-size.tooltip: Set the font size of the selected application description.

show-time-date.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show time and date on the menu.

time-format.tooltip: Choose the time format to show time on the menu.

date-format.tooltip: Choose the date format to show time on the menu.

accessible-box.tooltip: Choose whether or not to have a box on the accessible panel.

scroll-accessible.description: Show scrolling area of accessible panel
scroll-accessible.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show the scrolling area of accessible panel.

accessible-icons.description: Show icons on the accessible panel
accessible-icons.tooltip: Choose whether or not to have icons on the accessible panel.

show-removable-drives.description: Show removable drives on the accessible panel
show-removable-drives.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show removable drives on the accessible panel.

gnomenu-buttons-theme.tooltip: Select a layout of GnoMenu buttons.

gnomenu-box.tooltip: Choose whether or not to have a box on the GnoMenu buttons.

scroll-gnomenu.description: Show scrolling area of GnoMenu panel
scroll-gnomenu.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show the scrolling area of GnoMenu panel.

submenu-align.description: Align the submenu with the parent
submenu-align.tooltip: Choose whether or not to align the submenu with the parent.

search-sorted.tooltip: Select a method to sort search results.

search-filesystem.description: Enable filesystem path entry in search box
search-filesystem.tooltip: Allows path entry in the menu search box.

search-web.tooltip: Allows the web search with the selected search engines.

search-wikipedia.tooltip: Allows web search to the wikipedia search engine.

search-google.tooltip: Allows web search to the google search engine.

search-duckduckgo.tooltip: Allows web search to the duckduckgo search engine.

installer-tools.tooltip: Allows install, uninstall and search for programs and packages(need internet connection to be download).

installer-search.tooltip: Allows search for new packages on the repository.

installer-max-search.tooltip: Set the maximum number of packages to show.

installer-update-button.tooltip: Press this button to update the Cinnamon Installer tool.

installer-update-check.description: Enable to check for a new version of Cinnamon Installer when the menu started
installer-update-check.tooltip: Allows to check for a new version of Cinnamon Installer when the menu started.

installer-uninstall-button.tooltip: Press this button to uninstall the Cinnamon Installer tool.

installer-default.description: Enable the default Cinnamon packages manager tools
installer-default.tooltip: Allows the use of the default packages manager(only if it's available).
